scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma?

How goes it, Aoi?
Found anything edible?
Not a thing. Useless.

If Aoi couldn’t find anything, then there’s
nothing to be found!
That’s funny logic, but okay...
Let’s just keep looking.

You’re right.
Let’s look elsewhere.
Let us know if you find something, Takuma.
(If we find food, huh?)
Sure, you got it.
Is there food here?
Sure, you got it.

If I told Minoru first he’d just eat it all
up.
I don’t believe Minoru would stoop so low.
...Probably not.

Oh, I bet he would!
That’s the kind of boy he is!

Is there really any food here?
There’s probably just monsters...
Well...

You’re right. We don’t know for certain...
But we won’t know unless we look.
And I’d be worried if we did nothing.
Aoi...

I’m sorry. You’re doing your best.
I should shut up...

It’s fine. Things always seem terrible when
you’re hungry.
You might be right...

All the same, I think it’s best to leave the
kitchen to you, Aoi.
I’ll have to live up to that!

After we find some food, we’ll leave the
cooking to you.
Right. I’ll try not to let you down.

Hey, the kitchen! That should be the first
place we check!
I’ll go then, Takuma.
Let’s go, Labramon.
Okay!
